name: TestFormalizeConditions
cases: explain select * from t where a = 1 and b = 2 and c = 3 and d = 4
explain select * from t where a = 1 and b = 2 and (c = 3 or d = 4)
explain select * from t where a = 1 and b = 2 and (c in (1, 3) or c = 5)
explain select * from (select * from t where (d = 2 and b = 2) or b = 3) t where (c = 2 or c = 1) and a = 1
explain select * from t where (a = 1 or a = 2) and (b = 1 or b = 2) and (c = 1 or c = 2)
explain select * from t where a = 1 and (b, c) in ((1, 1), (2, 2))
